Asian equities rose after gains in Wall Stree, aided by U.S. gauge of Chinese shares, as markets withstood the hawkish comments from Fed officials at the annual conference in Jackson Hole, Wyoming.

articles.title: Paytm investors have shown faith in Vijay Shekhar Sharma with his reappointment. Will he deliver? - Economic Times
articles.description: When Paytm debuted on the stock exchanges last year, its early stage investors sold their stakes. With the stock now trading 64% lower than its issue price, existing investors desperately want to see the company turn in a profit. Can Sharma meet their expecta…
